select cm.id,cm.userId,cm.contactId,u.nickname as contactName,u.avatar as contactAvatar, cm.content,cm.fileName,cm.fileSize,cm.type,cm.time from User u join ChatMessage cm on cm.contactId like 'G%' and cm.userId = u.id where cm.contactId = #{groupId} order by cm.time

select hm.id as headMessageId,count(1) as unReadCount from HeadMessage hm left join ChatMessage cm on hm.userId = cm.contactId and hm.contactId = cm.userId where cm.handled = 0 and hm.userId = #{userId} group by hm.id union select hm.id as headMessageId,count(1) as unReadCount from HeadMessage hm left join ChatMessage cm on hm.userId = cm.userId where cm.handled = 0 and hm.userId = #{userId} and cm.contactId like 'G%' group by hm.id
